item.title: Github for Web Development: Campus Enterprise Agreement
item.description: UNT has entered into an University Unlimited enterprise agreement with Github. More details will be announced, but all faculty, staff and students will be elligible for Github Pro accounts, with many addtional features available for academics at no additional cost to the students. This article will help you get started using this service.
